CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 14, 1959, pg. 2 reads: "Celebrates 100 Years - Mrs. Susie Farris, of 7276 Verona Blvd., Penn Hills, who for 60 of her 100 years eked out a meager living as an Alabama cotton farmer, was honored recently on her 100th birthday by many of her scores of relatives. Shown reading Mrs. Farris' favorite Bible verse to the centenarian is Martha Isaacs, a granddaughter. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Martha Isaacs wearing eyeglasses, reading Bible to Susie Farris wearing shawl, seated in domestic interior
